pl.isangeles.senlin.graphic

Class StaticAvatar

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.isangeles.senlin.graphic.CharacterAvatar
      • pl.isangeles.senlin.graphic.StaticAvatar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, Effective

    public class StaticAvatar
extends CharacterAvatar
implements org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener
    Class for 'static' avatar (equipment changes do not affect avatar)
    Author:
    Isangeles
